attributes.action: Re-open the Petition entitled 'scrap the proposed introduction of ID cards'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the petition entitled 'scrap the proposed introduction of ID cards' be re-opened. We believe Democracy is about listening to the will of the people, not ignoring it when it does not match your own opinion.

rejection.details:
There is already a live petition against ID cards:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=ID+Cards
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
